summary:
Next thing you know, ppl will say star wars is pro fascism. 
The whole point of the cyberpunk genre is to say that in the future...
body:
Next thing you know, ppl will say star wars is pro fascism.

The whole point of the cyberpunk genre is to say that in the future if we dont fix things like aggressive capitalism that it will get worse with new tech.

Red dead redemption isnt saying you ahould be an outlaw.

Zelda isnt saying a magical apocolypse is good.

Walking dead isnt saying zombies are good

And cyberpunk isnt saying all thise horrible things are good

reblog.comment:

blog.name: angelofberlin2000
blog.title: Like a Rose trampled on the ground
blog.description:
In addition to the pain and the exhaustion, he recalled how waiting on the cross between takes became tedious. To fight the boredom, he listened to music on headphones. One particular song called "Above All" (Like a Rose ...) by Michael W. Smith helped him through his most difficult moments.

"It arrived when I was confused and angry. I didn't think I could go on. The song described how Jesus was rejected and alone. That thought took me to a place — it opened an interior door that held me while on the cross," an emotional Caviezel explained. "The experience of feeling rejected and alone as all those around me laughed while drinking their hot coffees, oblivious to what was occurring. Jesus must have felt like this — forsaken, rejected, alone, and despised. It helped me pray in a very deep way — to pray without words, to pray from the heart. The discomfort, the loneliness, the split shoulder, the raw flesh all forced me into the arms of God because I had nowhere else to go for a performance I knew I was unable to create."
Jim Caviezel, Shamelessly Catholic

summary:
"Johnny Silverhand wont be romanceable because he's a hologram and u can't fuck a hologram"
Bold of you to assume that I won't...
body:
“Johnny Silverhand wont be romanceable because he’s a hologram and u can’t fuck a hologram”

Bold of you to assume that I won’t 100% get behind a purely romantic relationship based on V’s and Johnny’s personalities/dynamic.

Not all relationships are based around your ability to sleep with someone.

reblog.comment:
“Johnny Silverhand wont be romanceable because he’s a hologram and u can’t fuck a hologram”

Not all relationships are based around your ability to sleep with someone.

title: Újra kínpadon a CD Projekt
body:
Újra kínpadon a CD Projekt

A Kotaku újságírója újra a túlórákról faggatta a lengyel cég vezetőjét.

Jason Schreier és a CD Projekt kapcsolatának lassan már történelme van. Még az E3 előtt pár héttel robbant ki egy kisebbfajta botrány, mely szerint a lengyel fejlesztőnél méretes túlórák vannak a Cyberpunk 2077 kapcsán és voltak korábban is a The Witcher 3 idején. A cég nem győzött cáfolni, de a végeredmény ha hihetőnek is…

View On WordPress
